text: chan midi klaw kæ phwk than wa chan mi khum khlang khx ngxallxh læa chan miru thung sing phn yan wisay læa chan midi klaw wa thæcring chan pen mlak læa læa midi klaw kæ brrda phu thi sayta khxng phwk than heyiydhyam wa xallxh ca mi thrng prathan khwam di kæ phwk khea xallxh thrng rxbru di ying thung sing thi xyu nı citcı khxng phwk khea thæcring tha pen chen nan chan ca xyu nı hmu phu xthrrm thanghlay”
